name: Obedient Servant
description:
Servant of the king or hero of the Mediterranean kingdom? What happens if an ordinary servant who cannot hold a sword decides to be promoted to the knights or even the royal guard? Defeat awaits you, or you will endure all the hardships of service and songs and legends will be composed about you!

The game is a 2D platformer with RPG elements. Hunt monsters, complete various tasks and level up in positions by rank.
Transform from an ordinary servant to an experienced hunter or a knight in the court of the king!

You have a huge advantage, you are not expected to be a great success, so if you fail in this or that business, you have every chance of success again!

All in your hands!
